subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Floyd suddenly resigned as basketball coach at Southern California on Tuesday following allegations that he gave $1,000 in cash to a man who helped steer the former star player O. J. Mayo to the Trojans.
snippet: Tim Floyd suddenly resigned as basketball coach at Southern California on Tuesday following allegations that he gave $1,000 in cash to a man who helped steer the former star player O. J. Mayo to the Trojans.
